testcase.name: Browse and Compare Window ACs and Check Availability
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the browser and open Google..................................passed When I type 'Flipkart' in the Google search field...........................passed Then I print all the suggestions displayed in the google search field.......passed And I hit Enter.............................................................passed Then I print all the search results displayed in the console................passed When I click on the first link..............................................passed Then Flipkart website should get opened up..................................passed And I close the login popup (If available)..................................passed When I click on 'Appliances'................................................passed And I hover over 'TV & Appliances'..........................................passed And I click on 'Window ACs'.................................................passed Then window ACs list is displayed...........................................passed When I click on 'Add to Compare' checkbox for the 2nd product displayed.....passed And I click on 'Add to Compare' checkbox for the 5th product displayed......passed And I click on 'Add to Compare' checkbox for the 7th product displayed......passed And I click on 'Add to Compare' checkbox for the 8th product displayed......passed And I click on 'Add to Compare' checkbox for the 9th product displayed......passed Then I print the message displayed on addition of the 9th product...........passed When I click on Compare.....................................................passed Then I print Name and Price of all products in console......................passed When I add the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th products to cart......................passed And I go to the cart........................................................passed And I add my area Pincode...................................................passed And I check the availability of the product in the console..................passed When the product is not available...........................................passed And I change the pincode to a valid pincode.................................passed Then I print the message displayed for the availability/delivery of the product in the console.passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed
